General.Name: JSW Holdings Limited
General.Description: JSW Holdings Limited, a non-banking financial company, primarily engages in investing and financing activities. It also invests in equity shares and other companies. JSW Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Mumbai, India.
